tool_description:
API which checks if email really exist on server or not.
It check for different parameters for giving end results .
Check for MX records, SMTP deliverability, Disposable check and many more.
name: Email Existence Validator
title: Email Existence Validator

api_list.name: Get the MX Records
api_list.description: endpoint for getting MX records from email address

api_list.name: Check for Disposable emails
api_list.description: Check if given email is disposable or temporary mail or not.

api_list.name: Verify the Existence of Email
api_list.description: endpoint which takes email and output result in JSON about existence of email on server.

api_list.name: Help Page
api_list.description: Provides a simple help to the User
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-existence-validator.p.rapidapi.com/help"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-existence-validator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
